features: Reusable Labeling Solution: Each set boasts 6 top-quality silicone baby bottle labels, offering a sustainable and reusable way to keep your baby's bottles organized.

Universal Fit: Our super stretchy bands effortlessly accommodate all baby bottle brands and sizes, including Dr. Browns, Philips AVENT, Comotomo, Medela, Nuk, MAM and Lansinoh, featuring a grippy texture ideal for babies learning to grasp their own bottle securely.
Built to Last: Crafted from top-notch food-grade silicone, these labels are built to withstand years of use without deterioration, ensuring durability and reliability.
Safety Assurance: BPA-free and designed for versatility, our labels are not only waterproof but also safe for the dishwasher, microwave, and freezer, ensuring both convenience and safety.

User-Friendly: With an easy writing process, quick drying, and simple cleaning with soap and water, these labels are not only practical but also eco-friendly as they are reusable, making parenting a breeze.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Premium Silicone Baby Bottle Labels for Daycare Welcome to hassle-free parenting with our Silicone Bottle Labels! Designed for busy parents, these bands bring ease and organization to your childcare routine. Keep track effortlessly, so you can cherish every moment with your little one.

Why Choose Our Bottle Labels? Bid farewell to bottle chaos with our Silicone Baby Bottle Labels. Committed to quality, we offer a reliable and durable solution, providing peace of mind for parenthood demands. Enjoy organized and convenient feeding moments with our labels.

Wrap our Silicone Bottle Label snugly around your baby's bottle. Wipe clean or toss in the dishwasher for easy maintenance. Stay confident during daycare drop-offs and busy days with well-organized feeding essentials. Elevate your parenting with our Silicone Bottle Labels today!

Your Benefits Universal fit Our silicone bottle labels adapts to most bottles. Splash of colors, dash of joy Choose from our silicone label's vibrant palette. Durable delight in every hue Our premium silicone handle lasts and flexes. Write, erase, reuse Easily erasable and endlessly reusable!

Does this silicone baby bottle labels fit all bottle brands? Absolutely! Our silicone labels are designed to fit various bottle brands, including popular ones like Philips Avent and Dr. Brown's. However, they are not suitable for Dr. Brown's 4oz bottles. What is the maximum bottle diameter these labels can accommodate? These labels are versatile and can be used on bottles with a diameter larger than 6cm, providing a flexible solution for different bottle sizes. Is the material safe for cleaning in a dishwasher or warming in a bottle warmer? Yes, our labels are made from high-quality food-grade silicone, ensuring they are safe for use in the dishwasher and bottle warmers. You can trust the durability and safety of our product. How do I maintain and reuse these labels effectively? Simply clean them by gently scrubbing with soap and water. If marker residue persists after multiple uses, a light scrub with acetone nail polish remover will remove any haze, ensuring they stay in top condition for repeated use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fit comotomo bottles
reviews.reviewText: These are wide and stretchable enough to fit the 4oz and 8oz comotomo bottles. You’ll have to stretch it a little but they will go in with not much of a hassle. I’ve put them on after I filled the bottle and there’s no issues. I’ve been using these for a week and so far so good.Using perm marker, the writing will stay on the whole day . They come off after washing every night (need a little scrub ) and effective for next day use.I had to tried a few brands - finally found these and would have been thankful for a review so others don’t have to go through several orders like me.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Doesn’t fit Dr. Brown’s 4 ounce bottles
reviews.reviewText: My only problem with these is they only fit Dr. Brown’s 8 ounce bottles. It didn’t fit any of our 4 ounce bottles but it still served its purpose as we just set them on the bottom. These are very convenient and they’re easy to clean off to replace the label.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect! Just what i wanted!
reviews.reviewText: This fit PERFECTLY around my daughters tomme tippie bottles! They are easy to put on and take off! The only downfall is they do not clean as good as i thought they would. The one in this picture was washed 3 times and it still showed what i wrote faintly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I’m Eco Concious with Reusable Labels! Mwa Ha Ha!
reviews.reviewText: I wanted these to label my left overs. I figured they’d work with mason jars (they do! See more below). I have peel off labels, but it kind of felt like a waste throwing them away so I was really excited when I saw these!I wish the instructions told me what kind of pen I could use that was erasable on it. I tried wet erase markers and they worked okay. They come off with water and don’t leave a mark on the labels. They don’t rub off after they dry if your hands are dry (if your hands are damp, it will smear and make a mess, though).It had to stretch a lot for a regular sized mason jar, and it made me nervous. I had one on there for three days and it didn’t shatter, so maybe they are okay? They fit a lot better on half pint and smaller mason jars. I can use them without worrying :) It makes it easier how they are dishwasher safe and even safe in the micro and the freezer!I like these :) It makes me feel better that I’m not just tossing labels in the garbage. I’ll just have to remember to keep my damp hands off them…and keep an eye on the reviews to see what pens other people found wipe off okay :)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I had these for our first child and they’ve held up almost 5 years. Definitely a must for for daycare. I got a new set for our second to use. I hate that sticky residue the bottle labels feel and these eliminate that issue. They’re also, wait for it...dishwasher safe!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Stretchy but ink smears off easy
reviews.reviewText: These do fit my Dr. Brown bottles perfectly. However, the ink smears off pretty easily and they attract things like dog hair and lint really easily.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good Product But Wrong Size
reviews.reviewText: I got these so I can label the bottle times in our fridge, but they are actually too big for our 4 ounce bottles. It's obviously my fault for not paying closer attention, but I saw the skinny Dr. Bronner's bottle in the photo and assumed it was the small 4 ounce bottle instead of the larger 9 ounce bottles. Anyway, the labels themselves seem sturdy and well made and like they will hold up well over time. We do have a set of larger bottles, so I will just hold onto these until our baby girl is ready for those.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fantastic little reusable "labels"
reviews.reviewText: What a great idea!These little pull on labels are easy to use, easy to write on (and to clean up) and the different colors are vibrant and can be used as an organizational tool.I really love all of these new fun and functional products that keep coming out!They are tough and seem like they'll last a long time. I'm sure you could use these on more than just baby bottles too.The product is awesome and the price is right. Toss some in your cart!Also would make a cute gift.
